text: Alfa Romeo Automobiles S.p.A. is an Italian car manufacturer created on June 24, 1910 in Milan. Alfa Romeo has been a part of the Fiat Group since 1986, and since January 2021 a part of Stellantis N.V. The company was originally known as A.L.F.A., which stands for Anonima Lombarda Fabbrica Automobili (English: Lombard Automobile Factory, Public Company). 1870 ==Models== * Alfa Romeo 145: produced 1994-2000 * Alfa Romeo 146: produced 1995-2000 * Alfa Romeo 147: produced 2000-2010 * Alfa Romeo 155: produced 1992-1997 * Alfa Romeo 156: produced 1997-2006 * Alfa Romeo 159: produced 2005-2011 * Alfa Romeo Brera/Spider: produced 2006-2011 * Alfa Romeo 164: produced 1987-1997 * Alfa Romeo 166: produced 1998-2007 * Alfa Romeo MiTo: produced 2008-2018 * Alfa Romeo Giulietta: produced 2010-2021 * Alfa Romeo 4C: produced 2013-2021 * Alfa Romeo Giulia: produced 2016-present * Alfa Romeo Stelvio: produced 2017-Present * Alfa Romeo Tonale: produced 2022-present ==References== Category:Automobile brands Category:1910 establishments in Italy
title: Alfa Romeo
